snippet.title: Evercade - Tomb Raider Collection 1 - Trailer
snippet.description:
A legend begins! Tomb Raider Collection 1 for Evercade includes the first three published adventures of the world's most famous acrobatic archaeologist, including Tomb Raider, Tomb Raider II Starring Lara Croft and Tomb Raider III: Adventures of Lara Croft!

Our first Giga Cart is available individually or bundled with the new Evercade EXP-R and Evercade VS-R consoles!

Tomb Raider Collection 1: £22.49/$24.99/€24.99
Evercade VS-R: £89.99 | $99.99 | €109.99
Evercade EXP-R: £99.99 | $99.99 | € 119.99
Pre-order: April 30th
Release: July 2024

Find out more: https://evercade.co.uk/tomb-raider-collection-1/
